job.title: Senior Mechanical Engineer (Hospital/Laboratory Facilities)
job.description: ATS Job ID- R118186, Job Location- US-VA-Centreville Not Applicable/None Parsons is an industry leader in delivering technology driven solutions to promote safer, healthier and sustainable world class infrastructure to communities throughout the world. Our landmark projects and capital improvement programs support global initiatives in healthcare, infrastructure, water, energy, power, renewables, environmental, and education. We are hiring colleagues with an entrepreneurial spirit who thrive on professional challenges in a high energy environment.  We are hiring Senior Mechanical Engineers with hospital/laboratory facility condition assessment and design experience. In this role, you will put your HVAC, plumbing, and piping systems and equipment survey, assessment, and design experience to good use for our clients, making design, performance, repair, and replacement recommendations that improve healthcare environments.  As a Senior Mechanical Engineer, you will perform onsite inspections of existing hospital and laboratory facilities and compose detailed narrative reports on the engineering systems and provide conceptual design for recommended new construction and system replacement projects. In addition, you will use Parsons and other client-directed online tools to record information and produce cost estimates for the proposed projects. Responsibilities will include working on professional teams to perform facility assessments and provide consulting support for infrastructure master planning assignments.
